name: most_expensive
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool most_expensive_nft_artworks.
Tool description: Get list of most expensive and bestselling NFTs ever
API description: Get most expensive artworks list.

**Possible filtering by gallery: **
Art Blocks
Async Art
Auction Houses
Foundation
hic et nunc
KnownOrigin
MakersPlace
Nifty Gateway
SuperRare

sort.description: The criterion by which to sort the artworks. Defaults to 'usd_price'.

page.description: The page number of the results to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

gallery.description: The gallery to filter results by. Possible values include:
